summary: This adds an armor called Markarth Armor that has the look & enchantments of the nightingale armor, but the stats of the daedric armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4505/7tw.png[/img]
[size=6]Heavy Nightingale Armor (Markarth Armor)[/size]
[size=5]Made By Request[/size][/center]
 
 
 
[size=6]Description[/size]
[size=4]This mod was made by request.[/size]
[size=4]Here\'s what I did: The Nightingale armor still is light armor and I did not change anything about it.[/size]
I Creadted a new armor that\'s called \"Markarth Armor\". It can be crafted at any forge with the \"Daedric Smithing\" perk.
The Markarth Armor is a Heavy Armor with the enchantments of the Nightingale Armor AND the stats of a Daedric armor.
There is an option to download a version without the enchantments if you want.

 
 
 
[size=6]Requirements[/size]
[size=4]None.[/size]
 
 
 
[size=6]Compatibility[/size]
Basically with everything. 
 
 
[size=6]Installtion + Unistalltion[/size]
[size=4]Use the mod manager and everything should be fine.[/size]
author: AGTweaks

files.name: AGTweaks - Heavy Nightingale - Markarth Armor - No Enchantments
files.fileName: AGTweaks - Heavy Nightingale - Markarth Armor - No Enchantments-38157-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: In the previous "No Enchantments" you couldn't enchant it on your own, now you can.
